title: Hextris
instructions: literally tetris
combine the blocks until you reach 2048

title: Clumsy Bird
instructions: remake of the orginal flappy birds

title: Wander
instructions: Explore a desolate wilderness with your grappling hook

title: Triangle: Back To Home
instructions: You are lost in the cave. Try to get out and back to home. Sometimes it can be easy, sometimes not… but don’t give up and you will do it

title: Dwarfs: There And Back Again
instructions: A tale of high adventure, undertaken by a company of dwarfs, in search of dragon-guarded gold, true friendship, and varieties of ale (not necessarily in that order)

title: Bounce Back
instructions: Boomerang adventure game

title: Offline Paradise
instructions: The world, a paradise, has gone offline; everything has become grey and dangerous. Traverse, jump and dash over the obstacles to turn the world back into normal

title: Planetfall
instructions: A space exploration game. The goal is to find satellite stations on each planet and take them offline

title: Quest Of Tod
instructions: A speed running adventure game, where you stuck inside unknown place controlled by strange machine. Can you find all the keys and codes to unlock the exit before the time runs out?

title: Racer
instructions: Start from the back of the pack, finish 1st to go to the next race!

title: Everyone's Sky
instructions: Make allies by completing missions, study other planets, stars, defend yourself against planetary defenses and pirate groups, or makes enemies by attacking them, ignoring their communications and destroying their facilities.

title: Evil Glitch
instructions: Strange glitches appear in your dimension, could you stop them to assimilate your world?

title: Off The Line
instructions: Strange glitches appear in your dimension, could you stop them to assimilate your world?

title: Space Huggers
instructions: A 2d alien platform shooter, eliminate as many enemies as you can with all your lives

title: Space Block Invaders
instructions: Fight back against the space invaders

title: Hit The Space
instructions: Travel the cosmos?!

title: Edge Not Found
instructions: Sokoban-style game with more than 20 puzzles set on an infinitely repeating grid.

title: PACKABUNCHAS
instructions: You are Spacey, from the PACKABUNCHAS, a group of space rangers specialized in packing and rescuing creatures around the galaxy! Solve tons of colorful tiling puzzles, in five different game modes. Any mode is fine as long as you rescue everyone, and there is no hurry, so relax and take your time!

title: Ninja Vs EVILCORPS
instructions: The bad and generic EVILCORP is believed to have come up with evil plans. As a ninja, your goal is to find those evil plans by hacking into its computers as quickly as possible.

title: Stolen Sword
instructions: A sword used to suppress the evil force was stolen, releasing a lot of demons. Find the theft and beat the demons! Drag to aim and release to jump and slash through enemies.

title: The Last Spartan
instructions: Cut your enemies to pieces and defend your homeland! Can you, the last Spartan Hoplite of your battalion, earn an honorable death across thousands of procedurally generated battlefields?

title: FOURFOLD
instructions: An abstract puzzle game, navigate your way through the missing platforms.

title: Highway 404
instructions: How long will you survive the perils of Highway 404, Canada's evilest motorway?

title: Xx142-b2
instructions: Hello, xx142-b2.exe. This is the year 2413, humanity is enslaved by an alien race for more than two centuries already. You are an AI weaponized virus built to infiltrate the alien network and deactivate all power generators and weapon systems. The alien antivirus will detect and delete you after 13 seconds. But remember: a file is never really deleted. Use the execution backtrace from your previous attempts to break in and destroy the main memory core.

title: Retrohaunt
instructions: Someone or something is stealing our time. Today was yesterday and tomorrow is nowhere to be seen. Detective Clay is on the case!

title: The Wandering Wraith
instructions: A lost wraith is wandering through the world seeking for peace. Will you guide him back to his grave so he can finally rest?

title: SWAGSHOT
instructions: The station on LZ-13 was taken over by its AIs! You must take it back... with style!

title: Nano-Wirebot
instructions: A simple platformer where you play as a nanobot that needs to fix some wires. Use the arrow keys for movement, and the browser back button (or backspace) to go back

title: Play Back
instructions: Oh no, you've been kicked out of the castle! Solve puzzles and make your way back to your rightful home. Puzzle-platformer game with an audio mechanic. Robots and platforms will only respond to sounds from tapes of the same color. Platforms with dark arrows on them will remember their position after saving, so you don't need to worry about losing too much progress if you die. Controls (when it says 'hold' make sure you hold down the key) Hold Left/Right Arrows or A/D = Move Left/Right Space or J = Jump Hold Down Arrow or S = Stop Grabbing Up Arrow or W = Climb up (while grabbing) G = Get/Pick up B = Drop (Brop?) I = Insert tape K = Eje(k)t tape Hold P = Play Hold R = Record Hold [ = Rewind Hold ] = Fast Forward T = Throw Enter = Shoot gun (should you find one)

title: Envisionator
instructions: This is a short puzzle game about escaping a building lockdown with the aid of your trusty robot friend.

title: ONOFF
instructions: Navigate through 25 brain-teasing levels in this fast-paced, hand-crafted platformer. You'll dodge spikes, jump over pits, and toggle between dimensions.

title: The Matr13k
instructions: After saving Morpheus, Neo needs to find an exit from this JavaScript version of the matrix. This is a beat em up, your objective is to kill everyone in your way in order to advance to the end of the rabbit hole. Use the arrow keys to move, S and D keys to punch and kick, space to jump, you also have some special moves

title: 1024 Moves
instructions: This puzzle can be solved in 1024 movements. That is to say, I think it is not possible to do it in less than 1024 movements.
